summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Fungus Nail Treatment,Sky-shop Fungus Nail Repair Oil, Fungal Nail Eliminator for Fingernails and Toenails, Repairs & Protects from Discoloration, Brittle and Cracked Nails (35ml)
Review Date: 2016/04/09
Store: Pei Mei
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pei Mei', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Item Weight': '0.25 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.0582 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Natural Nail Polish Remover', 'UPC': '646437736213'}
Review Text: This was a great buy as I have been on the lookout for a 100% natural nail polish remover. I like to do my daughters nails, but find traditional nail polish remover to be very harsh, which is why I wanted to find a product that was 100% natural, but effective. This product is just as effective as traditional nail polish removers, but without the toxic smell. Furthermore, since this product is natural I am hoping it will not damage my nails like other nail polish removers I have used in the past that ended up being corrosive. Excellent product, must buy if you are in the market for natural products that are very effective.
Review Title: Very Effective Nail Polish Remover
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Best Anti-bacterial Body Wash : Tea Tree Oil, Argan Oil and Coconut Oil 3-in-1 Formula By Keeva. 100% Natural Ingredients Are Perfect for Moisturizing Dry, Sensitive Skin, & Fighting Body Acne.
Review Date: 2016/04/09
Store: Keeva Organics
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive, Dry', 'Brand': 'Keeva Organics', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Antibacterial, Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11 x 10 x 3.4 inches; 1.9 Pounds', 'UPC': '641938999594'}
Review Text: This is an excellent natural body wash that is perfect for anyone that has sensitive skin. I have been using this product for several weeks now and I am very surprised at how soft and moisturized my skin feels. I also used it as a conditioner for my hair and was shocked at how soft and revitalized my skin felt. The ingredients in this body wash prompted me to use this product on my toddler and I am happy to state that the results were excellent. The body wash left my daughters skin soft and not irritated, which has occurred in the past with popular body washes. This product is made up of Tea Tree Oil, Coconut Oil and Argan Oil. I am not sure if anyone knows this, but another name for Tea Tree Oil is melaleuca. Melaleuca is known to kill bacteria, fungus and viruses. This is a very powerful anti-bacterial body wash that is absolutely worth the price.
Review Title: Very effective Body Wash
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jojoba Oil (4oz) USDA Certified Organic, 100% Pure, Cold Pressed & Unrefined by RejuveNaturals. Radiant, Moisturized & Youthful Skin & Hair. For Stretch Marks, Healthier Nails & Cuticles & Beard Oil
Review Date: 2016/04/09
Store: RejuveNaturals
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'RejuveNaturals', 'Scent': 'Fragrance Free', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.1 x 1.9 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '713331065791'}
Review Text: Jojoba oil is some of the best oil that one can apply to their body to soften the skin, as well as cuticle beds and hair. I have been using this product on my hands and feet and I am very happy with the product as it leaves my feet and hands soft in between manicures and pedicures. Jojoba oil is much better at keep ones hands and feet soft then lotion is which is why this product is a favorite of mine!
Review Title: Perfect for the Hands and Feet
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 808 Dude Face Wash Calms Teen Acne. Suitable for all Skin Types. Natural Ingredients Prevent Breakouts. Contains Essential Oils for a Healthy Acne Free Skincare Routine 5 fl oz
Review Date: 2016/04/10
Store: 808 Dude
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Sensitive, Dry', 'Brand': '808 Dude', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Tea Tree, Coriander, Rosemary, Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Patchouli', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.8 x 1.9 x 4.1 inches; 7.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': '74844', 'Manufacturer': '808 Dude'}
Review Text: This is an excellent face wash for teens, and to be honest anyone with blemishes. Only a small amount needs to be applied to a wet face as this fast wash lathers very well. I applied this face wash using a circular motion and rinsed my face with cold water. MY face felt very refreshed after using the product and this product left my skin feeling clean and hydrated. I am very impressed with the fact that this face wash did not irritate the skin in anyway. Many over the counter fast wash have harmful chemicals that not only dry the skin out, but irritate the skin and rob the skin of essential natural oils. My daughter has used this product several times now and she loves it. Although marketed to male teens girls also find the name of the product appealing and the design unique. Lastly, I love the fact that natural ingredients are being used to control acne. Tee tree oil has many positive benefits such as killing bacteria, which is the cause of a lot of acne breakouts. I am very impressed with this product and will purchase again
Review Title: Natural and Effective!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gio Naturals Organic Moroccan Argan Oil, 4 oz - 100% Pure and USDA Certified for Face, Hair, Skin and Nails
Review Date: 2016/05/20
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2.2 x 2.1 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103119702'}
Review Text: This product works wonders in keeping my skin soft and my hair moisturized. I cannot say enough about the products from Gio, only that they are all natural organic products that proven to moisturize and soften. Moroccan Argan oil is one of the best products to use on the skin and hair and this product is the real deal with no fillers or substitutes.
Review Title: The Real Deal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
**SUMMARY:**

The individual consistently favors natural, effective personal care products, emphasizing a preference for organic and non-toxic ingredients. Their reviews highlight a strong sentiment for products that enhance skin and nail health, frequently noting experiences with natural oils that provide hydration and softness. 

Common themes include a focus on moisturization, skin sensitivity, and effective acne treatment, suggesting a priority on products that cater to delicate skin, particularly for themselves and their children. The buyer shows a strong inclination towards multi-functional items, like body washes used as both cleansers and conditioners. 

Regarding quality, a notable preference emerges for natural formulations, particularly those containing essential oils like Tea Tree and Argan, linked to antibacterial benefits and overall skin care. Ratings also indicate a tendency to appreciate products that are free from harsh chemicals, with several purchases scoring high on efficacy despite lower average ratings within categories, possibly reflecting a willingness to overlook some minor product shortcomings for perceived overall benefits. 

Lastly, the buyer appears to show price sensitivity, opting for products that strike a balance between quality and affordability, suggesting a thoughtful approach to personal care purchases. Overall, their core preferences pivot around natural, safe, and versatile products that promote health and well-being for themselves and their family.

target_interaction.title: A Keeper!
target_interaction.text: Arian Oil is one of the best products one can used for the hair. This is an excellent shampoo that should be utilized to repair damaged hair by replacing essential oils due to over washing of the air. Over washing of the hair happens to many of us, especially if we work outside or use the gym frequently. What we do not realize is that we are stripping our hair of the natural oils we need to keep out hair healthy, bouncy and naturally shiny. I have used this product for a month and I have seen a major improvement in how my hair looks and the ease of styling it. I no longer have to add sheen products to my hair as it naturally is shining thanks to this product. I 100% recommend!
target_interaction.title_meta: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals
